statements: SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_content_creators;
SELECT creator_name, creator_email FROM augmented_reality_content_creators;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM augmented_reality_content_creators;
SELECT creator_name, project_name FROM augmented_reality_content_creators WHERE creator_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_content_creators WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_content_creators WHERE creator_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT creator_name, creator_email FROM augmented_reality_content_creators WHERE project_name = 'AR Game';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM augmented_reality_content_creators WHERE creator_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_content_creators WHERE project_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY creator_name DESC;
SELECT creator_id, creator_name, creator_email, project_id, project_name, project_description FROM augmented_reality_content_creators WHERE creator_name <> 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_creators;
SELECT creator_name, creator_email FROM augmented_reality_creators WHERE creator_join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_creation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT creator_name, creator_email, project_name FROM augmented_reality_creators JOIN projects ON augmented_reality_creators.creator_id = projects.project_creator_id;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_creators ORDER BY creator_join_date DESC;
SELECT creator_name, creator_email FROM augmented_reality_creators ORDER BY creator_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_creators WHERE creator_join_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, creator_name FROM projects INNER JOIN augmented_reality_creators ON projects.project_creator_id = augmented_reality_creators.creator_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM projects;
SELECT creator_name, COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM augmented_reality_creators LEFT JOIN projects ON augmented_reality_creators.creator_id = projects.project_creator_id GROUP BY creator_name;
SELECT creator_name, specialty FROM creators;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, creator_name FROM projects INNER JOIN creators ON projects.creator_id = creators.creator_id;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags;
SELECT creator_name, join_date FROM creators ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT creator_name, specialty FROM creators WHERE creator_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND project_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, creator_name FROM projects JOIN creators ON projects.creator_id = creators.creator_id WHERE projects.project_end_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT tag_name, COUNT(*) AS tag_count FROM tags GROUP BY tag_name ORDER BY tag_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM creators WHERE specialty IS NOT NULL ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM creators;
SELECT creator_name, email FROM creators WHERE timezone = 'UTC';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'Example%';
SELECT creator_name, project_name, content_type FROM creators c JOIN projects p ON c.creator_id = p.creator_id JOIN content co ON c.creator_id = co.creator_id;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM creators;
SELECT creator_id, creator_name, email FROM creators WHERE creator_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT project_name, creator_name FROM projects JOIN creators ON projects.creator_id = creators.creator_id;
SELECT content_type, content_url FROM content WHERE creator_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_name LIKE 'database%';
SELECT * FROM ARCreators;
SELECT creator_name, email FROM ARCreators;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM ARProjects WHERE project_status='active';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM ARFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM ARAssets WHERE asset_type='3D Model' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT AC.creator_name, AC.email, AP.project_name FROM ARCreators AC JOIN ARProjects AP ON AC.creator_id = AP.creator_id WHERE AP.project_status = 'Active';
SELECT AF.feedback_text, AF.rating, AP.project_name FROM ARFeedback AF JOIN ARProjects AP ON AF.project_id = AP.project_id WHERE AF.rating > 3;
SELECT AC.creator_name, AC.country, COUNT(AP.project_id) AS project_count FROM ARCreators AC LEFT JOIN ARProjects AP ON AC.creator_id = AP.creator_id GROUP BY AC.creator_name, AC.country;
SELECT AP.project_name, AA.asset_name, AA.asset_type, ATag.tag_name FROM ARAssets AA LEFT JOIN ARProjects AP ON AA.project_id = AP.project_id INNER JOIN ARTags ATag ON ATag.tag_id = AA.asset_id;
SELECT AF.project_id, COUNT(AF.feedback_id) AS feedback_count, AVG(AF.rating) AS avg_rating FROM ARFeedback AF GROUP BY AF.project_id HAVING AVG(AF.rating) > 4;
